body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap-env:Envelope xmlns:soap-env="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:soap-enc="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:trt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl" xmlns:tptz="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl" xmlns:timg="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/imaging/wsdl" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:tev="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/events/wsdl" xmlns:tan="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/analytics/wsdl" xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2" xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" xmlns:wstop="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/t-1" xmlns:wsaw="http://www.w3.org/2006/05/addressing/wsdl" xmlns:onvif="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema" xmlns:tds="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl" xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include" xmlns:wsrf-rw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/rw-2" xmlns:wsntw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/bw-2">
    {{SECURITY_HEADER}}
    <soap-env:Body>
        <tptz:AbsoluteMove>
            <tptz:ProfileToken>{{MEDIA_PROFILE}}</tptz:ProfileToken>
            <tptz:Position>
                <onvif:PanTilt x="-60" y="0" />
                <onvif:Zoom x="1" />
            </tptz:Position>
            <tptz:Speed>
                <onvif:PanTilt x="0" y="0" />
                <onvif:Zoom x="3" />
            </tptz:Speed>
        </tptz:AbsoluteMove>
    </soap-env:Body>
  </soap-env:Envelope>

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap-env:Envelope xmlns:soap-env="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:soap-enc="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:trt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl" xmlns:tptz="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl" xmlns:timg="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/imaging/wsdl" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:tev="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/events/wsdl" xmlns:tan="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/analytics/wsdl" xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2" xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" xmlns:wstop="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/t-1" xmlns:wsaw="http://www.w3.org/2006/05/addressing/wsdl" xmlns:onvif="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema" xmlns:tds="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl" xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include" xmlns:wsrf-rw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/rw-2" xmlns:wsntw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/bw-2">
    {{SECURITY_HEADER}}
    <soap-env:Body>
        <wsnt:Subscribe>
            <wsnt:ConsumerReference>
                <wsa:Address>http://192.168.12.112:59985/api/v2/resource/Camera001/OnvifCameraEvent</wsa:Address>
            </wsnt:ConsumerReference>
         	<tev:Filter>
             		<wsnt:TopicExpression>
                                tns1:RuleEngine/TamperDetector
                    </wsnt:TopicExpression>
                    <wsnt:MessageContent>
                            boolean(//tt:SimpleItem[@Name='IsTamper' and @Value='true'])
                    </wsnt:MessageContent>
     	</tev:Filter>
            <wsnt:TerminationTime>
                PT120S
            </wsnt:TerminationTime>
        </wsnt:Subscribe>
    </soap-env:Body>
  </soap-env:Envelope>

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap-env:Envelope xmlns:soap-env="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:soap-enc="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:trt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl" xmlns:tptz="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl" xmlns:timg="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/imaging/wsdl" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:tev="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/events/wsdl" xmlns:tan="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/analytics/wsdl" xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2" xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" xmlns:wstop="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/t-1" xmlns:wsaw="http://www.w3.org/2006/05/addressing/wsdl" xmlns:onvif="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema" xmlns:tds="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl" xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include" xmlns:wsrf-rw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/rw-2" xmlns:wsntw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/bw-2" xmlns:tt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">
    {{SECURITY_HEADER}}
    <soap-env:Body>
        <tan:CreateAnalyticsModules>
            <tan:ConfigurationToken>{{ANALYTIC_CONFIG_TOKEN}}</tan:ConfigurationToken>
            <tan:AnalyticsModule Name="TestAnalyticsModule" Type={{ANALYTIC_MODULE_TYPE}}>
                <tt:Parameters>
                    <tt:SimpleItem Name={{ANALYTIC_MODULE_OPTION_NAME}} Value={{ANALYTIC_MODULE_OPTION_VALUE}}/>
                </tt:Parameters>
            </tan:AnalyticsModule>
        </tan:CreateAnalyticsModules>
    </soap-env:Body>
  </soap-env:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap-env:Envelope xmlns:soap-env="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:soap-enc="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:trt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl" xmlns:tptz="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl" xmlns:timg="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/imaging/wsdl" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:tev="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/events/wsdl" xmlns:tan="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/analytics/wsdl" xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2" xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" xmlns:wstop="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/t-1" xmlns:wsaw="http://www.w3.org/2006/05/addressing/wsdl" xmlns:onvif="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema" xmlns:tds="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl" xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include" xmlns:wsrf-rw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/rw-2" xmlns:wsntw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/bw-2" xmlns:tt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">
    {{SECURITY_HEADER}}
    <soap-env:Body>
        <tan:ModifyAnalyticsModules>
            <tan:ConfigurationToken>1</tan:ConfigurationToken>
            <tan:AnalyticsModule Name="Viproc" Type="tt:Viproc">
                <tt:Parameters>
                    <tt:SimpleItem Name="Mode" Value="Profile 1"></tt:SimpleItem>
                </tt:Parameters>
            </tan:AnalyticsModule>
        </tan:ModifyAnalyticsModules>
    </soap-env:Body>
  </soap-env:Envelope>

request.description:
Input:

[GetCapabilities]

Category - optional, unbounded; [CapabilityCategory]

List of categories to retrieve capability information on.
- enum { 'All', 'Analytics', 'Device', 'Events', 'Imaging', 'Media', 'PTZ' }

Input:

[GetCapabilities]

Category - optional, unbounded; [CapabilityCategory]

List of categories to retrieve capability information on.
- enum { 'All', 'Analytics', 'Device', 'Events', 'Imaging', 'Media', 'PTZ' }

Input:

[GetCapabilities]

Category - optional, unbounded; [CapabilityCategory]

List of categories to retrieve capability information on.
- enum { 'All', 'Analytics', 'Device', 'Events', 'Imaging', 'Media', 'PTZ' }

Input:

[GetCapabilities]

Category - optional, unbounded; [CapabilityCategory]

List of categories to retrieve capability information on.
- enum { 'All', 'Analytics', 'Device', 'Events', 'Imaging', 'Media', 'PTZ' }

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap-env:Envelope xmlns:soap-env="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:soap-enc="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:trt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl" xmlns:tptz="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl" xmlns:timg="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/imaging/wsdl" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:tev="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/events/wsdl" xmlns:tan="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/analytics/wsdl" xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2" xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" xmlns:wstop="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/t-1" xmlns:wsaw="http://www.w3.org/2006/05/addressing/wsdl" xmlns:onvif="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema" xmlns:tds="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl" xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include" xmlns:wsrf-rw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/rw-2" xmlns:wsntw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/bw-2" xmlns:tt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">
    {{SECURITY_HEADER}}
    <soap-env:Body>
        <tan:CreateRules>
            <tan:ConfigurationToken>{{ANALYTIC_CONFIG_TOKEN}}</tan:ConfigurationToken>
            <tan:Rule Name="TestRule" Type="tt:ObjectInField">
                <tt:Parameters>
                    <tt:SimpleItem Name="ClassFilter" Value="Bike Car"></tt:SimpleItem>
                </tt:Parameters>
            </tan:Rule>
        </tan:CreateRules>
    </soap-env:Body>
  </soap-env:Envelope>

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap-env:Envelope xmlns:soap-env="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:soap-enc="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:trt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl" xmlns:tptz="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl" xmlns:timg="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/imaging/wsdl" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:tev="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/events/wsdl" xmlns:tan="http://www.onvif.org/ver20/analytics/wsdl" xmlns:wsnt="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/b-2" xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" xmlns:wstop="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/t-1" xmlns:wsaw="http://www.w3.org/2006/05/addressing/wsdl" xmlns:onvif="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema" xmlns:tds="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/device/wsdl" xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include" xmlns:wsrf-rw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/rw-2" xmlns:wsntw="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsn/bw-2" xmlns:tt="http://www.onvif.org/ver10/schema">
    {{SECURITY_HEADER}}
    <soap-env:Body>
        <tan:ModifyRules>
            <tan:ConfigurationToken>{{ANALYTIC_CONFIG_TOKEN}}</tan:ConfigurationToken>
            <tan:Rule Name="TestRule" Type="tt:ObjectInField">
                <tt:Parameters>
                    <tt:SimpleItem Name="MinObjectHeight" Value="20"></tt:SimpleItem>
                </tt:Parameters>
            </tan:Rule>
        </tan:ModifyRules>
    </soap-env:Body>
  </soap-env:Envelope>
